ops.js: fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:12, type:2, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:1, adjust:255});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:20}); // {GRAY}You'll find out soon.
But more importantly, 5 years ago{GRAY}

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:22}); // {GRAY}When you went to Mt. Nibel,
{Tifa} was your guide, right?{GRAY}

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:24}); // {GRAY}But where was {Tifa}
other than that?{GRAY}

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:26}); // {GRAY}It was a great chance for you two to
see each other again.{GRAY}
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:28}); // <fe>{GRAY}Why couldn't you see each other alone?<fe>{GRAY}

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:29}); // I don't know.
I can't remember clearly
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:30}); // <fe>{GRAY}Why don't you try asking {Tifa}?<fe>{GRAY}

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:33}); // Hey, wake up.
Wake up, {Cloud}!
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:12, type:2, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:16, type:1, adjust:255});

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // {Cloud}
{Tifa}{PAUSE}When Sephiroth and I went to Nibelheim,
where were you?
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:12, type:2, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:16, type:1, adjust:255});

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // {Cloud}
{Tifa}{PAUSE}When Sephiroth and I went to Nibelheim,
where were you?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:11}); // {Barret}
I'm gonna relax for a while.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:6}); // {Tifa}
{Cloud}, come here.
Everyone's here.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:7}); // {Tifa}
We saw each other, right?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // {Tifa}
Noit was 5 years ago.
I don't remember.{PAUSE}But, something seems strange outside.
{Cloud}, come quick.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:14}); // I heard what happened.
You've done so much for Priscilla.

dialogStrings:
{Cloud}
{Tifa}{PAUSE}When Sephiroth and I went to Nibelheim,
where were you?

Hmmm
{CHOICE}Let's get some rest
{CHOICE}No time to rest

{Tifa}
Noit was 5 years ago.
I don't remember.{PAUSE}But, something seems strange outside.
{Cloud}, come quick.

I heard what happened.
You've done so much for Priscilla.

You all must be tired.
If you want to get some rest,
stay here.

But more importantly, 5 years ago{GRAY}

see each other again.{GRAY}
